name: Gourd Baby In The Ruins - Gourd boy find gold
name_original: Gourd Baby In The Ruins - Gourd boy find gold
description: After year and year practice,the small gourd turn into a lovely person.And he has many amazing ability aslo.Such as change into small,capable of being launched,can carry guns and shoot etc.Now the gourd comes to the tomb ruins for looking for treasure.Let's go with him and take a adventure.
